title: Message to President Mustapha Kemal of Turkey on the Nonstop Flight From New York to Istanbul by American Aviators Boardman and Polando.
text:
I WISH TO express my sincere appreciation of the courtesies which you have shown the American fliers Boardman and Polando following their successful flight from New York to Istanbul.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency Gazi Mustapha Kemal, President of the Turkish Republic, Yalova, Turkey]
